_sText: I did not make this map. This map is being used by TWL for this season and one of the things they requested was a radar overview. I made the radar overview and since leagues require sv_pure, the radar which is a custom texture does not show up. Since the file was changed, the name was changed as well to avoid confusion. This map is a Source remake of the Counterstrike 1.6 map de_forge by brute of www.brutesmaps.com which was a remake of the original Counterstrike map de_cbble with the intention to make the gameplay more balanced for league play.
